languages.text: {n}Пускай тонкие черты Ирлиэт и остались прежними, глубокая синева вокруг глаз и потускневший взгляд делают ее похожей на живой труп. {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Эльдарка{/g} выглядит иссушенной, загнанной, мрачной... Однако при вашем приближении привычная резкость во взгляде сменяется едва заметной надеждой.{/n} "Ты вернул{mf|ся|ась} из тьмы, элантах? Невредим{mf|ый|ая}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Пускай тонкие черты Ирлиэт и остались прежними, глубокая синева вокруг глаз и потускневший взгляд делают ее похожей на живой труп. {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Эльдарка{/g} выглядит иссушенной, загнанной, мрачной... Однако при вашем приближении привычная резкость во взгляде сменяется едва заметной надеждой.{/n} "Ты вернул{mf|ся|ась} из тьмы, элантах? Невредим{mf|ый|ая}".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Although Yrliet's sharp features remain the same, the deep shadows around her eyes and her listless gaze give her the appearance of a living corpse. The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} looks withered, haunted, despondent... But when you approach, the relentlessness in her eyes is replaced with a faint glimmer of hope.{/n} "You came back from the dark, elantach? Unharmed."
languages.original_text: {n}Пускай тонкие черты Ирлиэт и остались прежними, глубокая синева вокруг глаз и потускневший взгляд делают ее похожей на живой труп. {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Эльдарка{/g} выглядит иссушенной, загнанной, мрачной... Однако при вашем приближении привычная резкость во взгляде сменяется едва заметной надеждой.{/n} "Ты вернул{mf|ся|ась} из тьмы, элантах? Невредим{mf|ый|ая}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Although Yrliet's delicate features remain the same, the deep shadows around her eyes and a listless gaze give her the appearance of a living corpse. The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} woman looks withered, haunted, despondent... But when you approach, the relentlessness in her eyes is replaced with a faint glimmer of hope.{/n} "You came back from the dark, elantach? Unharmed."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} looks withered, haunted, despondent... But when you approach, the relentlessness in her eyes is replaced with a faint glimmer of hope.{/n} "You came back from the dark, elantach? Unharmed."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}尽管伊莉耶特尖锐的五官没有任何变化，但她眼睛周围布满了深色的阴影，目光也毫无生机，看起来像一具行尸走肉。这位{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}看起来无比憔悴、消沉、绝望……但当你接近时，她冷漠的双眼中燃起了一丝微弱的希望。{/n}“你从黑暗之中回来了吗，外界人？你安然无恙。”
languages.original_text: {n}Although Yrliet's sharp features remain the same, the deep shadows around her eyes and her listless gaze give her the appearance of a living corpse. The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} looks withered, haunted, despondent... But when you approach, the relentlessness in her eyes is replaced with a faint glimmer of hope.{/n} "You came back from the dark, elantach? Unharmed."

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管伊莉耶特尖锐的五官没有任何变化，但她眼睛周围布满了深色的阴影，目光也毫无生机，看起来像一具行尸走肉。这位{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}看起来无比憔悴、消沉、绝望……但当你接近时，她冷漠的双眼中燃起了一丝微弱的希望。{/n}“你从黑暗之中回来了吗，外界人？你安然无恙。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Although Yrliet's sharp features remain the same, the deep shadows around her eyes and her listless gaze give her the appearance of a living corpse. The Aeldari looks withered, haunted, despondent... But when you approach, the relentlessness in her eyes is replaced with a faint glimmer of hope.{/n} "You came back from the dark, elantach? Unharmed."

languages.text: {n}A pesar de que las facciones afiladas de Yrliet no han cambiado, las profundas sombras que rodean a sus ojos y su mirada lánguida le dan el aspecto de un cadáver reanimado. La {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} está marchita, atormentada, abatida... pero, cuando te acercas, la inquietud de sus ojos se convierte en el tenue resplandor de la esperanza.{/n} «¿Has vuelto de entre las sombras, elantach? ¿A salvo?».
languages.original_text: {n}Although Yrliet's sharp features remain the same, the deep shadows around her eyes and her listless gaze give her the appearance of a living corpse. The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} looks withered, haunted, despondent... But when you approach, the relentlessness in her eyes is replaced with a faint glimmer of hope.{/n} "You came back from the dark, elantach? Unharmed."

traits.locale_text: {n}A pesar de que las facciones afiladas de Yrliet no han cambiado, las profundas sombras que rodean a sus ojos y su mirada lánguida le dan el aspecto de un cadáver reanimado. La {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} está marchita, atormentada, abatida... pero, cuando te acercas, la inquietud de sus ojos se convierte en el tenue resplandor de la esperanza.{/n} «¿Has vuelto de entre las sombras, elantach? ¿A salvo?».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットの鋭い顔立ちは変わらないが、目の周りの深い隈と無気力なまなざしは、まるで生きている死体のようだった。{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}は枯れ果て、憔悴し、落胆しているように見える…だが、あなたが近づくと、彼女の目に宿る容赦のなさが、かすかな希望の光に変わる。{/n}「暗闇から戻ってきたのか、エランタ。しかも、無傷で」
languages.original_text: {n}Although Yrliet's sharp features remain the same, the deep shadows around her eyes and her listless gaze give her the appearance of a living corpse. The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} looks withered, haunted, despondent... But when you approach, the relentlessness in her eyes is replaced with a faint glimmer of hope.{/n} "You came back from the dark, elantach? Unharmed."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットの鋭い顔立ちは変わらないが、目の周りの深い隈と無気力なまなざしは、まるで生きている死体のようだった。{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}は枯れ果て、憔悴し、落胆しているように見える…だが、あなたが近づくと、彼女の目に宿る容赦のなさが、かすかな希望の光に変わる。{/n}「暗闇から戻ってきたのか、エランタ。しかも、無傷で」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliets scharfe Gesichtszüge bleiben reglos, doch die tiefen Schatten um ihre Augen herum und ihr rastloser Blick lassen sie wie eine lebende Leiche wirken. Die {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} sieht verwelkt aus, verstört, verzweifelt ... Als du dich jedoch näherst, weicht die Unnachgiebigkeit in ihren Augen einem schwachen Hoffnungsglimmern.{/n} "Ihr seid aus der Dunkelheit zurückgekehrt, Elantach? Unverletzt."
languages.original_text: {n}Although Yrliet's sharp features remain the same, the deep shadows around her eyes and her listless gaze give her the appearance of a living corpse. The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} looks withered, haunted, despondent... But when you approach, the relentlessness in her eyes is replaced with a faint glimmer of hope.{/n} "You came back from the dark, elantach? Unharmed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliets scharfe Gesichtszüge bleiben reglos, doch die tiefen Schatten um ihre Augen herum und ihr rastloser Blick lassen sie wie eine lebende Leiche wirken. Die {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} sieht verwelkt aus, verstört, verzweifelt ... Als du dich jedoch näherst, weicht die Unnachgiebigkeit in ihren Augen einem schwachen Hoffnungsglimmern.{/n} "Ihr seid aus der Dunkelheit zurückgekehrt, Elantach? Unverletzt."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Bien que les traits anguleux d'Yrliet n'aient pas changé, les cernes marqués sous ses yeux et son regard apathique lui donnent l'apparence d'un cadavre animé. L'{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} a l'air éreintée, hantée, abattue... Cependant, lorsque vous vous approchez d'elle, son regard implacable laisse entrevoir une faible lueur d'espoir.{/n} « Vous êtes {mf|revenu|revenue} des ténèbres, elantach ? Indemne, qui plus est. »
languages.original_text: {n}Although Yrliet's sharp features remain the same, the deep shadows around her eyes and her listless gaze give her the appearance of a living corpse. The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} looks withered, haunted, despondent... But when you approach, the relentlessness in her eyes is replaced with a faint glimmer of hope.{/n} "You came back from the dark, elantach? Unharmed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bien que les traits anguleux d'Yrliet n'aient pas changé, les cernes marqués sous ses yeux et son regard apathique lui donnent l'apparence d'un cadavre animé. L'{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} a l'air éreintée, hantée, abattue... Cependant, lorsque vous vous approchez d'elle, son regard implacable laisse entrevoir une faible lueur d'espoir.{/n} « Vous êtes {mf|revenu|revenue} des ténèbres, elantach ? Indemne, qui plus est. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Her ne kadar Yrliet'in keskin yüz hatları sabit kalsa da gözlerinin etrafında dans eden gölgeler ve umursamaz bakışları, âdeta yaşayan bir ceset gibi görünmesine sebebiyet veriyor. {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} solgun görünüyor. Kederli, belki de umutsuz... Lakin gözlerindeki merhametsizlik, yaklaşmanla birlikte yerini hayal meyal bir umut ışığına bırakıyor.{/n} "Elantach, karanlıktan çıkıp aramıza geri döndün ha? Saçının teline bile zarar gelmemiş."
languages.original_text: {n}Although Yrliet's sharp features remain the same, the deep shadows around her eyes and her listless gaze give her the appearance of a living corpse. The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} looks withered, haunted, despondent... But when you approach, the relentlessness in her eyes is replaced with a faint glimmer of hope.{/n} "You came back from the dark, elantach? Unharmed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Her ne kadar Yrliet'in keskin yüz hatları sabit kalsa da gözlerinin etrafında dans eden gölgeler ve umursamaz bakışları, âdeta yaşayan bir ceset gibi görünmesine sebebiyet veriyor. {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, solgun görünüyor. Kederli, belki de umutsuz... Lakin gözlerindeki merhametsizlik, yaklaşmanla birlikte yerini hayal meyal bir umut ışığına bırakıyor.{/n} "Elantach, karanlıktan çıkıp aramıza geri döndün ha? Saçının teline bile zarar gelmemiş."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
